price: 有人说：“地啊！汲干你上面的水吧！云啊！散开吧！”于是洪水退去了，事情就被判决了。船停舶在朱迭山上。有人说：“不义的人们已遭毁灭了。”
arabic: وَقِيلَ يَٰٓأَرۡضُ ٱبۡلَعِي مَآءَكِ وَيَٰسَمَآءُ أَقۡلِعِي وَغِيضَ ٱلۡمَآءُ وَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَٱسۡتَوَتۡ عَلَى ٱلۡجُودِيِّۖ وَقِيلَ بُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqīla yāarḍu ib'laʿī māaki wayāsamāu aqliʿī waghīḍa al-māu waquḍiya al-amru wa-is'tawat ʿalā al-jūdiyi waqīla buʿ'dan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
